edu.cscc.javaadventure.engine.combat

Class CharacterCombatant

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cscc.javaadventure.engine.combat.CharacterCombatant
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Combatant, java.lang.Comparable<Combatant>

    public class CharacterCombatant
extends java.lang.Object
implements Combatant
    Represents a Combatant which is backed by a Character in the JavaAdventure game. It implements the Combatant interface.

      • getInitiative

        public int getInitiative()
        Gets the current initiative of the combatant. See Combatant.calculateInitiative(int)
        Specified by:
        getInitiative in interface Combatant
        Returns:
        The initiative value.

      • calculateInitiative

        public void calculateInitiative(int roll)
                         throws InvalidRollException
        Description copied from interface: Combatant
        Initiative represents the order in which combatants can act in a turn-based game. A lower initiative is better, meaning the combatant can act before other combatants can act.
        Specified by:
        calculateInitiative in interface Combatant
        Parameters:
        roll - The roll value used when determining initiative.
        Throws:
        InvalidRollException - When the die roll is invalid or out of the allowed bounds.

      • attack

        public java.lang.String attack(int roll,
                               Combatant combatant)
                        throws OpponentIncapacitatedException,
                               InvalidRollException
        Attack another combatant. Success and damage of the attack is based on the implementation of the interface.
        Specified by:
        attack in interface Combatant
        Parameters:
        roll - Represents a die roll which determines if the attack was successful or not.
        combatant - The target combatant to be attacked.
        Returns:
        A description of the attack.
        Throws:
        OpponentIncapacitatedException - When the opponent is already incapacitated and cannot fight anymore.
        InvalidRollException - When the die roll is invalid or out of the allowed bounds.

      • getArmorClass

        public java.lang.Integer getArmorClass()
        Armor class represents the combatant's ability to defend themselves. Generally a higher armor class is better.
        Specified by:
        getArmorClass in interface Combatant
        Returns:
        The current armor class of the Combatant.

      • isActiveCombatant

        public boolean isActiveCombatant()
        Indicates if the combatant can still fight or not. Generally this is based on the combatant's health, but could be implemented differently for different reasons.
        Specified by:
        isActiveCombatant in interface Combatant
        Returns:
        true if the combatant can still fight, false otherwise.
